pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantitative Exploration of Elastic Net Families for Generalized Linear Models // Provides a quantitative toolkit to explore elastic net families and to uncover correlates contributing to prediction under a cross-validation framework. Fits linear, binomial (logistic), multinomial and Cox regression models. Candia J and Tsang JS, BMC Bioinformatics (2019) 20:189 doi:10.1186/s12859-019-2778-5.
